# <a name="export-your-contacts-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="f38ba-102">在 Outlook.com 中匯出您的連絡人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f38ba-102">Export your contacts in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="f38ba-103">移至 [人員](https://outlook.live.com/people/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f38ba-103">Go to [People](https://outlook.live.com/people/)</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="f38ba-104">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f38ba-104">.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="f38ba-105">在頁面頂端，選取 [ **管理** \> **匯出**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f38ba-105">At the top of the page, select **Manage** \> **Export**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="f38ba-106">選擇您是否要匯出特定資料夾中的所有連絡人或所有連絡人，並選取 [ **匯出**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f38ba-106">Choose if you want to export all contacts or only contacts from a specific folder and select **Export**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="f38ba-107">在頁面底部，選取 [ **儲存** ]，然後將 [contacts.csv] 儲存在預設的 [下載] 資料夾中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f38ba-107">At the bottom of the page, select **Save** and "contacts.csv" will be saved in your default Downloads folder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f38ba-108">若要選擇儲存 .csv 檔案的位置，請選取 [儲存] 旁邊的箭號，然後選取 [另 **存**新檔]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f38ba-108">To choose where to save the .csv file, select the arrow next to Save and select **Save as**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f38ba-109">如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [將連絡人從 Outlook.com 匯出至 CSV](https://support.office.com/article/578cca22-3550-4c73-b3f0-9978cfeac83f?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f38ba-109">For more information, see [Export contacts from Outlook.com to a CSV file](https://support.office.com/article/578cca22-3550-4c73-b3f0-9978cfeac83f?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
